Title: Look Who's Talking Too
Writer: Amy Heckerling, Neal Israel, Amy Heckerling (characters)
Actors: John Travolta, Kirstie Alley, Olympia Dukakis, Elias Koteas
Plot: Mollie and James are together and raising a family, which now consists of an older Mikey and his baby sister, Julie. Tension between the siblings arises, and as well with Mollie and James when Mollie's brother Stuart moves in. Mikey is also learning how to use the toilet for the first time.
